title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When the font size of a label is modified, the label's height does not update immediately. This causes the label's content to overflow and not justify with the font size.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to the application.
2. Edit the font size of the label to be '18 points'.
OB: When modifying the font size of a label to '18 points', the label's height does not change immediately.
EB: The label's height should change immediately after modifying the font size to '18 points'.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Locate the label in question.
3. Modify the font size of the label to '18 points'.
